thiefworld.agents

Class FruitSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.agents.Agent
      • thiefworld.agents.FoodSource
        • thiefworld.agents.FruitSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class FruitSource
extends FoodSource
    A source of fruit modeled using the apple's growing cycle.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

        The number of fruit sources created.

      • harvestEndDay

        private static final int harvestEndDay
        The day in a 365 days cycle when the fruit start rotting.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • harvestDepletionDay

        private static final int harvestDepletionDay
        The day in a 365 days cycle when the fruit are completely gone (i.e. winter is coming).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • harvestStartingDay

        private static final int harvestStartingDay
        The day in a 365 days cycle when the fruit are ready for harvesting.
        See Also:

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getFruitQuantity

        public double getFruitQuantity()
        Retrieves the amount of fruit available in the fruit source.
        Returns:
        the amount of fruit available in the fruit source.

      • setFruitQuantity

        public void setFruitQuantity(double fruitQuantity)
        Sets the amount of fruit available in the fruit source.
        Parameters:
        fruitQuantity - the amount of fruit available in the fruit source.

      • step

        public void step(sim.engine.SimState arg0)
        Provides a lifecycle for the fruit source modeled after the apple's lifecycle. The fruit source starts producing fruit at harvestStartingDay and is completed by harvestEndDay. After that the fruit start roting until the harvestDepletionDay is reached, when winter is coming.
